explanations.machine learning: The paper compares traditional regression with machine learning tools, indicating the use of machine learning techniques.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions traditional regression as one of the methods compared for forecasting.
explanations.neural network: The paper uses artificial neural networks (ANN) as part of the hybrid models.
explanations.deep learning: The use of recurrent neural networks (RNN) suggests the application of deep learning techniques.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The paper specifically mentions CSD-RNN as one of the hybrid models used.
explanations.RNN: Abbreviation for recurrent neural network, which is used in the hybrid models.
explanations.denoising autoencoder: The paper discusses denoising techniques (CSD based denoising) which are related to denoising autoencoders in concept.
